dict.acceptation: 大的；重要的；（计划）庞大的；大方的；
大量地；成功地；夸大地；宽宏大量地；

sent.orig: The word "big" has one syllable and the word "Africa" has three syllables.
sent.trans: “big”这个词只有一个音节而“Africa”有三个音节。

sent.orig: There remains a tension at the heart of BIG s predicament.
sent.trans: 目前，BIG心里仍维持着一种紧张的态势。

sent.orig: BIG might sell its Bsian arm to another insurance firm; Prudential was not the only bidder.
sent.trans: BIG也许会将其亚洲分支出售给另外一家保险公司，保信并不是独一的竞价人。

sent.orig: Carrie fell for the wealthy Mr. Big.
sent.trans: Carrie爱上了那位富有的Big先生。

sent.orig: In this sentence, the word BIG is in capitals.
sent.trans: 本句中BIG一词用的是大写字母。
